content: Bank Account UOB One Card Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 05 Jun 2018Any savings account that allows you to earn bonus interest and air miles on credit card spend at the same time (currently using the UOB One card which is a cash back card)?2 answersAnswerBump0

Tang Ching PangLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 25 Jun 2018DBS multiplier will do the job when stack with DBS altitude . DBS multiplier required any amount spend on DBS card to earn extra interest. While spending on DBS altitude will allow you to earn air miles. The best part : the miles point will never expire.0 comments1
